snippet.title: Ketz: Galactic Overlords - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Ketz: Galactic Overlords is a roguelite RPG bullet heaven with a universe blending Science and Fantasy, where you challenge the dark forces that disrupt the galactic balance on the planet Ketz. Witness the deep stories of Galactic Leaders who oppose the disruption of galactic balance and support you with various blessings. Discover the dynamic connections between them and uncover the mysterious secrets of the planet Ketz!


⬇️ Wishlist on steam ⬇️
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2542140/Ketz_Galactic_Overlords/

Don't forget to visit our steam store for more information about Ketz !


Follow Ketz: Galactic Overlords:
Official website : https://ketzroguelite.com/
X: https://x.com/KetzRogueLite
Chat with us on Discord: https://discord.gg/EKXafWUkTa


Follow Keep Games!
Official website :
Twitter: https://twitter.com/KeepGamesco
Chat with us on Discord: http://discord.gg/keepgames
